spec_data.Name: rubygem-columnize
spec_data.Description:
In showing a long lists, sometimes one would prefer to see the value
arranged aligned in columns. Some examples include listing methods
of an object or debugger commands.
See Examples in the rdoc documentation for examples.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 11:04:04 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Module to format an Array as an Array of String aligned in columns
